hero.title: Secure and Convenient
hero.description: Kaitu.io provides professional-grade network proxy services, supporting multi-platform clients with advanced encryption technology to ensure your network connections are secure, fast, and stable.

security.title: Kaitu Protocol - Next-Generation Network Transmission Technology
security.description: Kaitu Protocol is our proprietary next-generation network transmission protocol, utilizing advanced technologies such as multipath aggregation, military-grade encryption, and intelligent routing to provide you with a secure, fast, and stable network connection experience.

caTech.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
caTech.description: Kaitu Protocol's proprietary multipath aggregation technology enables simultaneous data transmission through multiple network channels, achieving bandwidth aggregation and intelligent load balancing. Even if a single path fails, seamless switching ensures uninterrupted connections.

advantages.title: Core Features
advantages.item1: Multi-channel simultaneous transmission with intelligent bandwidth aggregation
advantages.item2: Real-time RTT measurement with automatic optimal path selection
advantages.item4: Exponential moving average algorithm for precise path evaluation

adaptive.title: Enterprise-Grade Network Adaptation
adaptive.item1: Intelligently select optimal protocol based on network conditions
adaptive.item2: Support for multiple transport methods including WebSocket, HTTP/2
adaptive.item3: Real-time network quality monitoring and optimization
adaptive.item4: Reliable connection guarantee in poor network conditions

multipath.title: Multipath Aggregation
multipath.description: Simultaneously utilize multiple network channels, intelligently select optimal paths, achieve bandwidth aggregation and automatic failover

encryption.title: Military-Grade Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256-GCM encryption algorithm, ECDSA P-256 elliptic curve, PBKDF2 with 100,000 iterations for key derivation

smartRouting.title: Intelligent Routing
smartRouting.description: Real-time path optimization based on RTT, exponential moving average algorithm ensures always using the fastest channel

disguise.title: Traffic Obfuscation
disguise.description: CA certificate simulation technology, traffic appears as standard HTTPS, seamlessly blending into normal network environment

failover.title: Automatic Failover
failover.description: Millisecond-level switching when single path fails, completely transparent to users, ensuring business continuity

performance.title: High-Performance Architecture
performance.description: Supports 5000 concurrent connections, 32KB buffer pool optimization, zero-copy data forwarding

kaitu.name: Kaitu
kaitu.tech: MPTCP multipath aggregation + CA certificate obfuscation

visualization.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
visualization.subtitle: Live demonstration: Data transmitted simultaneously through multiple relay nodes, intelligently selecting optimal paths
visualization.description: The diagram above illustrates Kaitu Protocol's multipath aggregation architecture: Data from the client is simultaneously transmitted through multiple geographically distributed relay nodes to the target server. The system monitors each node's latency (RTT) in real-time, automatically allocating more traffic to the optimal node (green dashed box). When a node fails, traffic instantly switches to other available nodes, ensuring uninterrupted connections. Each relay node can also be configured with multiple NICs for further bandwidth aggregation.
